abstract: The Securities and Exchange Commission has decided not to file insider trading charges against David L. Sokol, a onetime top lieutenant at Berkshire Hathaway and aide to Warren E. Buffett, according to Mr. Sokol’s lawyer, Barry Wm. Levine.
snippet: The Securities and Exchange Commission has decided not to file insider trading charges against David L. Sokol, a onetime top lieutenant at Berkshire Hathaway and aide to Warren E. Buffett, according to Mr. Sokol’s lawyer, Barry Wm. Levine.
lead_paragraph: The Securities and Exchange Commission has decided not to file insider trading charges against David L. Sokol, a onetime top lieutenant at Berkshire Hathaway, Mr. Sokol’s lawyer said Thursday.

headline.main: S.E.C. Ends Scrutiny of Former Top Aide to Buffett
headline.print_headline: S.E.C. Ends Scrutiny Of Ex-Aide To Buffett
